text:
Nichika! You're a beat behind!
Focus on speed starting from the previous turn!

────I'm sorry!
Could we do it one more time, please?

Nichika-chan, good job!
How about some lemonade?

Lemonade has this perfect balance of sweetness and
freshness, I really like it. ...Sorry, am I being annoying?

……I'm sorry.
I'm just tired, that's all.
The lesson must have been tough, right?…!

But Nichika-chan is really giving it her all, we can't
afford to fall behind, everyone was talking about that.

Yeah!
I conveyed it on behalf of everyone!

──Oh, the lemonade's getting lukewarm!
Sorry sorry, here you go…!
